text: Nikoloz Rurua (, 17 March 1968 â€“ 4 December 2018) was a Georgian politician. He was a member of the Cabinet of Georgia as Minister of Culture and Monument Protection of Georgia from 10 December 2008 until 25 October 2012 during the Mikheil Saakashvili presidency. He was born in Tbilisi, Georgia. Rurua died of a heart attack at his Tbilisi apartment on 4 December 2018, aged 50. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Georgia (country)
title: Nika Rurua
